tasks.name: CORE_ENGINE.REFACTOR
tasks.fullDescription: Complete overhaul of the game engine's core architecture. This includes optimizing the rendering pipeline, implementing a new entity component system, and improving memory management for better performance across all platforms.

tasks.name: MULTIPLAYER.NETCODE
tasks.fullDescription: Building robust multiplayer networking using client-server architecture. Includes implementing lag compensation, client-side prediction, server reconciliation, and entity interpolation for smooth multiplayer gameplay.

tasks.name: UI_SYSTEM.REDESIGN
tasks.fullDescription: Designing and implementing a new UI system with support for complex animations, transitions, and interactive elements. Built with modularity in mind for easy reusability across different game screens.

tasks.name: PROCEDURAL.GENERATION
tasks.fullDescription: Implementing procedural generation algorithms for creating infinite, varied game levels. Uses seed-based generation, noise functions, and custom rule sets to ensure both variety and playability.

tasks.name: AUDIO.ENGINE
tasks.fullDescription: Integration of advanced 3D spatial audio engine with support for HRTF, reverb, occlusion, and dynamic mixing. Ensures immersive audio experience that responds to game environment.

tasks.name: PHYSICS.OPTIMIZATION
tasks.fullDescription: Optimizing physics engine for better performance. Implementing spatial partitioning, continuous collision detection improvements, and multithreading support for physics calculations.

tasks.name: ASSET.PIPELINE
tasks.fullDescription: Creating an automated asset processing pipeline for textures, models, and audio. Includes compression, LOD generation, and platform-specific optimization.

tasks.name: SAVE.SYSTEM
tasks.fullDescription: Building a comprehensive save system with local storage, cloud sync capabilities, and automatic backup. Includes save state versioning and migration support.
